questions.question_text: Which two options are configured on the directory number configuration page within Cisco Unified Communications Manager Administrator? (Choose two.)

User A needs to have a line shared on the user B phone. Both phones register with Cisco Unified Communications Manager. Which method can be used from
Cisco Unified Communications Manager Administration web pages to configure a shared line on the user B phone?

choices.A: Navigate to the user B phone > Add the user A DN.
choices.C: Navigate to DN configuration > Shared Line > Add the user A DN.
choices.D: Navigate to end user configuration > Shared Line > Add the user A DN. A
choices.B: Navigate to the user B phone > Shared Line > Add the user A DN.

discussion.content: A. Navigate to the user B phone > Add the user A DN.
The Answer is C. End User Configuration.

questions.question_text: An engineer receives a service ticket because a user cannot log into Cisco Unified CM User Options. Where can the engineer verify that the user account is active?

discussion.content:
B. uses presence status to determine availability
C. reverts back to operator a transferred call
F. defines operator working hours and automatically redirect calls

questions.question_text: Which three features of the Cisco Unified Attendant Console can a user use to streamline the company telephony communications? (Choose three.)

choices.C: reverts back to operator a transferred call
choices.E: provides call detail records reports to upper management
choices.D: provides a conference call with up to 10 participants
choices.A: promotes a phone call into a video call
choices.F: defines operator working hours and automatically redirect calls BCF
choices.B: uses presence status to determine availability
